sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, Heart, Brain, Activity, Shield, Zap, Users, TrendingUp, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const stats = [ { label: 'Predictions Made', value: '50K+', icon: TrendingUp }, { label: 'Accuracy Rate', value: '94%', icon: CheckCircle }, { label: 'Happy Users', value: '10K+', icon: Users }, { label: 'Health Conditions', value: '25+', icon: Heart } ]; const features = [ { icon: Heart, title: 'Heart Disease Prediction', description: 'Advanced cardiovascular risk assessment using multiple health indicators' }, { icon: Brain, title: 'Mental Health Analysis', description: 'Comprehensive mental wellness evaluation and personalized recommendations' }, { icon: Activity, title: 'Lifestyle Assessment', description: 'Holistic health scoring based on daily habits and lifestyle choices' }, { icon: Shield, title: 'Disease Prevention', description: 'Proactive health monitoring to prevent chronic conditions' } ]; const predictorCategories = [ { title: 'Cardiovascular Health', description: 'Predict heart disease, stroke risk, and cardiovascular conditions', icon: Heart, count: 8, color: 'from-red-500 to-pink-600' }, { title: 'Mental Wellness', description: 'Assess depression, anxiety, and overall mental health status', icon: Brain, count: 6, color: 'from-purple-500 to-indigo-600' }, { title: 'Lifestyle & Fitness', description: 'Evaluate fitness levels, nutrition, and lifestyle-related health risks', icon: Activity, count: 7, color: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-600' }, { title: 'Specialized Conditions', description: 'Predict diabetes, cancer risk, and other specialized health conditions', icon: Zap, count: 4, color: 'from-yellow-500 to-orange-600' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background */}
{/* Animated Background Elements */}

AI-Powered{' '} Health Predictions {' '} for Better Living

Harness the power of advanced artificial intelligence to predict health risks, assess medical conditions, and receive personalized healthcare insights.

Explore Predictors
{/* Floating Icons */}

Health Dashboard

Heart Rate
72 BPM
Blood Pressure
120/80
Stress Level
Low
{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
); })}
{/* Features Section */}

Advanced AI Health Predictions

Our cutting-edge machine learning algorithms analyze multiple health indicators to provide accurate predictions and personalized recommendations.

{features.map((feature, index) => { const Icon = feature.icon; return (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

); })}
{/* Predictor Categories Section */}

Comprehensive Health Predictions

Explore our wide range of AI-powered health predictors, each designed to provide accurate insights into different aspects of your health and wellness.

{predictorCategories.map((category, index) => { const Icon = category.icon; return (

{category.title}

{category.count} predictors

{category.description}

Explore Predictors
); })}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Take Control of Your Health?

Join thousands of users who trust our AI-powered health predictions to make informed decisions about their wellness journey.

Start Predicting
); }; export default Home;
